description:
When http://anidb.net/ch11210 [Kiki] performs her first landing in the town of http://anidb.net/ch40121 [Koriko] she almost causes a traffic incident, and get scolded by a policeman because of this.
Kiki almost gets ticketed by this policeman but he is successfully lured away by http://anidb.net/ch13886 [Tombo] who tries to help this interesting new girl but only earns ingratitude.
name: Keikan
